title: Waste Management and Valorization - Alternativnologies
description:
Waste Management and Valorization - Alternative Technologies - Elena Cristina Rada (AAP, 2016).pdf

ISBN 978-1-77188-307-8

Edited by a leading researcher in the field, this book provides an overview of waste valorization and includes the editorâ€™s research in addition to other experts and recent and relevant studies on this critical topic. It covers treatment and pretreatment technologies and methodologies, energy recovery from solid wastes, recycling and reuse, additional cutting-edge valorization methodologies. Primarily aimed at researchers and advanced students in biochemical, engineering, and environmental fields, this book should also provide a valuable reference for municipal legislators and industry practitioners
